content.question: Iodine-<math alttext="131"><semantics><mn>131</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> has a half-life of <math alttext="8"><semantics><mn>8</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> days. In a particular sample, the amount of iodine-<math alttext="131"><semantics><mn>131</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> remaining after <math alttext="d"><semantics><mi>d</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> days can be modeled by the function <math alttext="h"><semantics><mi>h</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> given by <math alttext="h open parentheses d close parentheses equals A subscript 0 open parentheses 0.5 close parentheses to the power of open parentheses d divided by 8 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>d</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>A</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msup><mfenced><mn>0.5</mn></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>d</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="A subscript 0"><semantics><msub><mi>A</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is the amount of iodine-<math alttext="131"><semantics><mn>131</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in the sample at time <math alttext="d equals 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following functions <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> models the amount of iodine-<math alttext="131"><semantics><mn>131</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> remaining after <math alttext="t"><semantics><mi>t</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> hours, where <math alttext="A subscript 0"><semantics><msub><mi>A</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is the amount of iodine-<math alttext="131"><semantics><mn>131</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in the sample at time <math alttext="t equals 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ? (There are <math alttext="24"><semantics><mn>24</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> hours in a day, so <math alttext="t equals 24 d"><semantics><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>24</mn><mi>d</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.)

choices.label: ​<math alttext="k open parentheses t close parentheses equals A subscript 0 open parentheses 0.5 close parentheses to the power of open parentheses t divided by 24 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>k</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>A</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msup><mfenced><mn>0.5</mn></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>24</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="k open parentheses t close parentheses equals A subscript 0 open parentheses 0.5 to the power of open parentheses 1 divided by 24 close parentheses end exponent close parentheses to the power of open parentheses 8 t close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>k</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>A</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msup><mfenced><msup><mn>0.5</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>/</mo><mn>24</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="k open parentheses t close parentheses equals A subscript 0 open parentheses 0.5 to the power of open parentheses 24 close parentheses end exponent close parentheses to the power of open parentheses t divided by 8 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>k</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>A</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msup><mfenced><msup><mn>0.5</mn><mfenced><mn>24</mn></mfenced></msup></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="k open parentheses t close parentheses equals A subscript 0 open parentheses 0.5 to the power of open parentheses 1 divided by 192 close parentheses end exponent close parentheses to the power of t"><semantics><mrow><mi>k</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>A</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msup><mfenced><msup><mn>0.5</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>/</mo><mn>192</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mfenced><mi>t</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="k open parentheses t close parentheses equals A subscript 0 open parentheses 0.5 to the power of open parentheses 1 divided by 192 close parentheses end exponent close parentheses to the power of t"><semantics><mrow><mi>k</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>A</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msup><mfenced><msup><mn>0.5</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>/</mo><mn>192</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mfenced><mi>t</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

topic.text: 2.5: Exponential Function Context and Data Modeling

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
